trait.name: Detect Invisibility
entries: Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The tressym has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Poison Sense
entries: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the {@spell find familiar} spell can choose to conjure a tressym in stead of a normal cat.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.
